value.string:
computer = context.Agent_getComputerDocumentFromReference(computer_reference)
 software_release = context.Agent_getSoftwareReleaseDocumentFromReference(software_release_reference)
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 software_release_url = software_release.getUrlString()
 from Products.ZSQLCatalog.SQLCatalog import Query, ComplexQuery
 service_relative_url = portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredSoftwareCleanupResource()
 service = portal.restrictedTraverse(service_relative_url)
 service_uid = service.getUid()
 state_list = []
 state_list.extend(portal.getPortalReservedInventoryStateList())
 state_list.extend(portal.getPortalTransitInventoryStateList())
 packing_list_line = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type='Purchase Packing List Line',
 simulation_state=state_list,
 default_resource_uid=service_uid,
 sort_on=(('movement.start_date', 'DESC'),),
 aggregate_relative_url=ComplexQuery(
 Query(aggregate_relative_url=software_release.getRelativeUrl()),
 Query(aggregate_relative_url=computer.getRelativeUrl()),
 operator="AND"),
 )
 if packing_list_line is None:
 return None
 return packing_list_line.getParentValue()
